English:
[u]0.03a2[/u]
- Better Tutorial Framework!
[u]0.03a1[/u]
- Added better clicklable roads sprites
- Reworked Road colliders
- Added Tutorials
- Added 2 more levels
- Added early level finish (if all quests completeted)
[u]BugFixes:[/u]
- Fixed several errors with UI.
- Fixed several errors with Music.
Spanish:
[u]0.03a2[/u]
- Sistema de tutoriales mejorado!
[u]0.03a1[/u]
- Mejores sprites clickables de carreteras
- Rediseñado colisionadores de carretera
- Añadidos tutoriales
- Añadidos 2 nivles jugables
- Ahora el nivel puede terminar antes de tiempo (Si todas las misiones fueron cumplidas)
[u]BugFixes:[/u]
- Arreglados diversos errores de interfaz
- Arreglados diversos errores con la Música.

English: Welcome to [FF5454FF]Truck City[-].\nYour Job is to Deliver Cargo from one place to another.\n
Spanish: Bienvenido a [FF5454FF]Truck City[-].\nTu tarea es llevar carga de un sitio a otro.

English: For that you will use these [FF5454FF]trucks[-]
Trucks are stupid. You will have to touch on certain roads to [FF5454FF]rotate[-] them
Spanish: Los camiones son estupidos. Tendras que [FF5454FF]tocar[-] en ciertas carreteras para rotarlas

English: Make your trucks pick [FF5454FF]Cargo[-] from here
Spanish: Haz que tus camiones recogan [FF5454FF]Carga[-] de aquí

English: As you saw before, There are more than one kinds of cargo.\nNow, let's try with [FF5454FF]2 trucks![-]
Spanish: Como ya vimos antes, hay mas de un tipo de cargamento.\nAhora, vamos a probar con [FF5454FF]2 camiones![-]

English: Remenber, pick cargo from these places
Spanish: Recuerda, recoge la carga de estos sitios

English: And deliver it to these 2 places
On this level, watch carefully how trucks turn
Spanish: En este nivel, observa con detenimiento como giran los camiones

English: Remenber that you can hit the [FF5454FF]?[-] icon of the menu to watch the level stopped, or to repeat the tutorial
Spanish: Recuerda que puedes tocar el icono de ? del menú para ver el nivel en pausa, o para repetir el tutorial

English: [FF5454FF]Time is really important[-] on this one
Factories not always produce infinte amounts of Cargo
Spanish: Las factorias no siempre producen cargamento infinito

English: Sometimes they store a limited amount of Cargo Items
Spanish: A veces almacenan una cantidad limitada de Carga

English: And produces [FF5454FF]more[-] cargo every once in a while when it's capacity isn't full
Spanish: Y producen [FF5454FF]más[-] cargamento de cada cierto tiempo cuando no están llenos

English: Try to synchronize the arrival of your trucks with the production times of the factories
Spanish: Intenta sincronizar la llegada de tus camiones con la producción de las factorias

English: For that: sometimes it's better to make your Trucks to lose some time
Spanish: Para ello: a veces es mejor hacer que tus camiones pierdan el tiempo

English: Each Delivery yields different amounts of money
Spanish: Cada envio da una cantidad diferente de dinero

English: Make a good decision to where send your trucks!
Spanish: Decide donde deben ir tus camiones!

English: These are [FF5454FF]Road Blocks[-] they block one lane of the Road
Spanish: Estos son [FF5454FF]Bloqueos[-] y bloquean un carril

English: Your Trucks will [FF5454FF]Turn Around[-] when encountering a Road Block
Spanish: Tus camiones [FF5454FF]Daran la vuelta[-] cuando se encuenten con un Bloqueo.

English: Try to use it on your advantage
On this level we have added one more truck!
Spanish: En este nivel hemos añadido un nuevo camión!

English: Worry not, overall speed is slower
But don't sleep or trucks will run wild!
Spanish: Pero presta atención o los camiones se te descontrolaran
